resources.string: This component is not available yet.
Fail: you need to select something first.
Fail: you need to select an item
Hypertensive crisis: Immediately notify your loved ones, contact the nearest medical facility for support
Hypertension stage 2: The condition can get worse at any time, so ask your doctor to prescribe a diuretic in combination with an antihypertensive drug.
Hypertension stage 1: Your doctor may prescribe diuretics to lower your blood pressure and you need to adjust your lifestyle and regularly control your blood pressure.
Hypertension Warning: should lie down to rest, breathe deeply, relax the body, do not add sugar, do not eat salty foods, do not use stimulants
Good pressure: keep living like this
Very Good pressure: keep living like this
Low blood pressure: limit alcohol intake and increase water intake, control body salt intake, avoid hot baths or saunas
Low blood pressure crisis: Immediately contact the nearest medical center for treatment
Impossible: The data you entered is quite vague and it is unlikely that such a case will happen
Heart Rate High: Please avoid vigorous exercise and try to breathe evenly
Heart Rate High Warning: Give up bad habits such as smoking, alcohol, using stimulants and drink enough water
Heart Rate Normal: you are healthy
Good Heart Rate: you are healthy
Heart Rate Low Warning: Your heart rate shows signs of slowing down, you should quit smoking, reduce salty foods, limit fatty foods, eat more vegetables
Heart Rate Low: You should contact your doctor to ask for medicine, call your relatives for support
Very Good: you have the lungs of an athlete, keep practicing
Good: Your lungs can handle pressure quite well, keep up the exercise
Normal: Your lungs are like everyone else, you should exercise more to be in good shape
Low: you have a little trouble with your lungs, maybe because of the body, but you should try exercises that require physical strength such as jogging, swimming or pull-ups
Very Bad: you have problems with your lungs, if you find it difficult to breathe, contact your doctor immediately, or it may be because you are lacking oxygen due to intense activity
Obese class 3: you should go to the medical center for treatment right away, your condition is very bad
Obese class 2: Be careful in eating because you will most likely have fatty liver, high blood pressure, diabetes
Obese class 1: You are not in a dangerous state, but you must also be vigilant in eating and drinking and should build an exercise schedule to reduce excess fat
Overweight: You should consider spending more time exercising and building a reasonable diet
Normal: your body is quite moderate and should maintain a healthy diet, plus exercise
Mild Thinness: you need nutrients, eat more vegetables and red meat to build muscle
Moderate Thinness: You should add fat to your diet
Severe Thinness: You look like a toothpick, your diet is too poor to make you like that, eat more meals a day and get enough sleep
Too high: you have too many calories left over, so it\'s easy to get acne, so adjust it
High: you take in a bit more than you consume, do something to reduce it
Warning: Your calorie level is too different
Normal: enough calories to keep you active
Good: proper calorie levels for work and activity
Less: You take in quite a bit, so you should add more nutrients
Too less: looks like you are not eating, should eat something right away to avoid fainting due to lack of energy
Sleep too much: Oversleeping can ruin your circadian time, try to get up earlier to improve your spirit
Long sleep: Sleeping too much will make you very sluggish and difficult to complete your work, so adjust
Long sleep: Your sleep is good enough to function for 1 day
Normal: You should wake up earlier, you should create a morning exercise routine to wake up earlier
Short sleep: If you\'re not busy, give me another 1-2 hours to sleep
Short sleep: If you find it difficult to fall asleep, avoid stimulant foods such as coffee or cows, turn on soft music and practice deep breathing to help you fall asleep more easily.
Short sleep: you should turn off your phone and go to sleep, your sleep time is like the number of times it rains in the desert
Use too much: If you don\'t want to be a slave to your phone, turn it off and talk to your loved ones more
Use much: should reduce the time to use from tomorrow and focus on outside activities more
Use much: it seems that you depend on your phone a lot, learn to read books, it will be very helpful
Normal: you use with a sufficient prognosis of a person
Good: you are not dominated by your phone and have a healthy life, keep up the good work
Too Long: You should consult your doctor about this
Long: You should consult a relative or doctor and have tampons ready in case
Warning: abnormal, should actively buy tampons in case of need
Normal: Normal menstrual cycle, eat in moderation and keep in good shape to avoid irregular periods
Warning: your period has signs of earlier, please pay attention to avoid unexpected cases
Short: You should delay your cycle a few days early to take better care of yourself
Too Short: Menstrual cycle is earlier than normal people, be careful to take better care of yourself
Fail: data of item not valid.
Change to statistics of all items
Data processing with units of %s, prediction after 10 %s.
Press okay when you are ready.
fit: You should keep your workout regimen like this
Back to menu without save information?
You need to create personal data
